sub_title: Experienced Corporate Finance / M&A / Private Equity professional
summary:
Sander has more than  30 years of experience in the financial services industry. 

This experience ranges from Private Equity investing, commercial banking, structured finance to corporate finance (M&A advisory) across various industries (ao Transport, Industrial Manufacturing, Oil & Gas, Financial Institutions, Financial Sponsors and TMT). 

Having been based in Rotterdam, Amsterdam, Brussels, Hong Kong, Madrid, London and Ghent I have been exposed to entirely different business cultures and thereby master several languages: Dutch (native), English (Fluent), Spanish, French and German (all advanced).

Specialties: Private Equity investing, Mergers and acquisitions, financial advisory, construction materials, technology

In my most recent position at Baltisse I have built the Private Equity franchise from scratch to the current organization consisting of 8 professionals
